title: Maximum position of a point on a line

content.prompt: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its acceleration at any time t is  a ( t ) = 2 t − 7 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@410C@ . If the initial velocity of the particle is 6, at what time t during the interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF7@  is the particle farthest to the right?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
